name: Furball Over The Front (2021)
description:
Take to the skies over the western front in this WW1 Sim-Shooter. Play as an Allied or German pilot in 6 different planes from 1915-1918. Balloon Busting, Ground Attack, and Dogfighting missions await you!

3 Allied planes to fly: Airco DH2, Nieuport, and the Sopwith Camel, each more maneuverable and durable than the last

3 German planes to fly: Fokker E, Albatros D, and the Fokker Triplane, each more maneuverable and durable than the last

5 Historical Aces to shoot down or fly with: Max Immelmann, Oswald Boelcke, Werner Voss, Erwin Böhme, and Manfred von Richthofen (the Red Baron)

100+ missions in story mode covering the spring of 1916 to the spring of 1918 (Allied) or the fall of 1915 to the spring of 1918 (German)

Earn endurance missions, medals, and increase your rank as you complete the story missions

Requires a device with 4GB of RAM or more
